}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== Per the (rt2870) Windows driver set provided by '''[[Planex]]''', the USB ID for this device is 2019:ed10. Based on the age of the device, it is presumed to be using RT2870+RT2820.
{{WiFiCert|WFA5529|08/23/2007}} :This cert. is shared with the GW-US300MiniW and GW-US300MiniW-X.
